about_the_game:
In this VR experience, take on the role of a transplant surgeon facing the challenge of performing surgery on aliens and cyborgs in a dystopian world. Use the diverse tools at your disposal to solve environmental surgery puzzles using your mechanical arms. And stay alert... you never know what dangers lie within.


In a dystopian future where aliens, cyborgs, and humans coexist, healthy organs are the new currency. You embody Cuz, a specialist in the art of trans-species surgery, faced with conditions that could only be described as… unconventional. Alongside your AI partner Walt, you are drawn into a critical endeavour to thwart the sinister plans of a hate-mongering priest to save an alien race from his clutches.

• The Bee Bus

Not your average medical transport. Command this nimble vessel to traverse the biological landscape within your patients, reaching areas otherwise inaccessible by foot.

• The Tools

Scanner

A diagnostic tool designed to probe environmental elements, providing crucial information and insights that aid in puzzle resolution.

Grasper

Extend your reach with this tool, designed to retrieve items beyond normal grasp and manipulate objects with precision and ease.

Scalpel

Designed to deliver accurate and controlled cuts, this tool allows you to delicately sever veins to redirect blood flow, while also serving as a formidable weapon against adversaries.

Drill

Engineered to dismantle crystalline formations and bodily build-ups, this drill enables access to concealed materials and organs.

Syringe

Used for extracting and harnessing natural substances like acids, antibiotics, and anti-inflammatories from the surrounding environment. Employ these fluids in treatment to rejuvenate and heal patient tissues.

Laser

A dual-purpose device, pivotal for cauterizing wounds to halt bleeding and for providing a line of defense against distant threats.
